subject: Re: Short HOWTO on using git for Samba development
body:
On Jun 24, 2007, at 3:34 PM, Gerald (Jerry) Carter wrote:

> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
> Hash: SHA1
>
> It's pretty basic.  Just about cloning the tree, and basic
> work flow.
>
>  http://wiki.samba.org/index.php/Using_Git_for_Samba_Development
>
> I'll do some more updates tomorrow.

Jerry, can you give a quick summary of why you chose the particular  
branch structure in  this tree? For example, why is "master"  
unpopulated?

--
James Peach | jpeach@samba.org
